sn34.46:1.3: samadhismim abhiniharakusalo hoti, na samadhismim gocarakusalo …
sn34.46:1.4: neva samadhismim gocarakusalo hoti, na ca samadhismim abhiniharakusalo …
sn34.46:1.5: samadhismim gocarakusalo ca hoti, samadhismim abhiniharakusalo ca …
sn34.46:1.6: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, gava khiram, khiramha dadhi, dadhimha navanitam, navanitamha sappi, sappimha sappimando tatra aggamakkhayati;
sn34.46:1.7: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvayam jhayi samadhismim gocarakusalo ca hoti samadhismim abhiniharakusalo ca ayam imesam catunnam jhayinam …pe…
